articles.author: Jeff PassanESPN
articles.title: Washington Nationals' Juan Soto tops Seattle Mariners' Julio Rodriguez in final round to win 2022 Home Run Derby
articles.description: Juan Soto, whose All-Star week was upended by questions about his future with the Nationals after he turned down a $440 million extension, pounded 19 home runs in the final round to edge Mariners star rookie Julio Rodriguez for the Home Run Derby title.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES -- If Juan Soto gets traded, the team that acquires him won't just be getting one of the best hitters in baseball. It will get the reigning Home Run Derby champion, too.

articles.title: Deandre Ayton 'happy' with resolution after signing extension; Phoenix Suns tout 'vital' piece
articles.description: Deandre Ayton called his new 4-year deal with the Suns a "blessing" and said he is happy to put his extended restricted free agency behind him.
articles.content:
Deandre Ayton says he gained generational wealth that can help his family and many others after signing a four-year, $133 million maximum contract extension to return to the Phoenix Suns on Monday.

articles.title: Sources - Big 12, Pac-12 won't partner as talks officially end
articles.description: Officials from the Big 12 told Pac-12 officials on Monday that they're no longer interested in exploring a partnership, sources said.
articles.content:
Talks about a partnership between the Big 12 and the Pac-12, which had been discussed extensively the past two weeks, have officially ended, sources told ESPN.
